directions: Layer granola, pineapple chunks, yogurt and whipped topping in parfait or dessert glasses.  Serve.
ingredients: 1 cup granola or banana nut crunch cereal
1 (20 ounce) can DOLE® Pineapple Chunks, drained
1 (6 ounce) container strawberry yogurt or any flavor
1 (8 ounce) tub light thawed whipped topping
title: Yogurt Crunch Parfaits from DOLE®
